definition: to drain the cup in one gulp (idiom)
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely
to the greatest extent/(when used before a noun of location) furthest or extreme/to be within the limits of/to give priority to

sentences.english: And with that he finishes the man's drink in one gulp .
sentences.chinese: 他话一说完，就把男子的酒一饮而尽。

sentences.english: I like the city air, I like to drink of it.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢这城市的空气，我喜欢这样一饮而尽。

sentences.english: The bridegroom quaffed down a glass of brandy.
sentences.chinese: 新郎将一杯白兰地酒一饮而尽。

sentences.english: She held the glass and chugged the water down.
He poured himself a brandy and swallowed it neat.
sentences.chinese: 他给自己倒了一杯白兰地，没兑水就一饮而尽。

sentences.english: He emptied the cup at a draught.
Wolff reached for his drink and drained the glass.
sentences.chinese: 沃尔夫伸手去取杯子，然后一饮而尽。

sentences.english: This glass of wine, which his friend definitely wouldn't refuse, must be tossed off at once.
sentences.chinese: 这杯酒，友人一定是毫不推却，一饮而尽的。

sentences.english: Finish saying and quaff in one gulp the brandy in the glass.
sentences.chinese: 说完又将杯中的酒一饮而尽。

sentences.english: He drank the glass of water in one draught.
sentences.chinese: 他将杯里的水一饮而尽。

sentences.english: At one gulp , he emptied the cup, then waited.
sentences.chinese: 他端起茶杯一饮而尽，然后就等着。

sentences.english: Brendan drained the rest of his glass and looked back into Tom's face, which seemed more serious now, his lips closed in a flat line.
sentences.chinese: 丹拿起杯子一饮而尽，回头看看汤姆的脸。

sentences.english: The champagne was quaffed from huge golden goblets.
sentences.chinese: 香槟酒被从金色的高脚杯里一饮而尽。

sentences.english: He gulped down the rest of his tea and went out.
sentences.chinese: 他把剩下的茶一饮而尽便出去了。

sentences.english: He emptied his glass at one draught.
Grandpa drank up again with tears in his eyes.
sentences.chinese: 祖父满含热泪又一次一饮而尽。

definition: to toast sb (with wine etc)/to drink a toast
to drink a toast/Cheers! (proposing a toast)/Here's to you!/Bottoms up!/lit. dry cup
